: : Wolfenstein/SharpClaws : :

Wolfenstein only nodded at his, once again, commander. The mission was a simple one. Get the clone into Maximal hands.

At the next part however, Wolf swallowed hard, gulping. Of course he would never let his fear show. Wolf stands firm in the face of Hydras' fusion cannon, and waits for Maximal to implant the self destruct device.

SharpClaws watched, unleasing a low chuckle. This was what a traitor deserved.


Jeff <x_rauq_x@...> wrote:
--Hydras/Perceptor--

As Perceptor entered the main room followed by Wolfenstein and 
SharpClaw, Hydras' mind skipped a step. He would have to talk to 
Perceptor later about informing him of things before hand. On the 
other hand it was, perhaps, a tactful decision. Hydras might have 
simply blasted the bot earlier.

"Wolfenstein. The foolish bot returns from his escapade with 
failure... I should melt you to scrap right now for your insolent 
behaviour, but I have a better idea." a small smile catches the 
edges of Hydras' mouth.

"Maxima dear, begin work on the Blackstrom clone." Hydras says with 
a short glance back at the female predacon. "Implant a virus into 
the clone to lay dormant until they try to reformat the Blackstorm 
clone and return her to Nightlight."

The Predacon commander turns back to the newly returned 
Wolfenstein. "Ah yes, now for your part. It is your job to escort 
the clone on a recon mission which vectors nearest to the Maximal 
base. I'm sure their sensors will pick you up. It will be your job 
to make sure the clone gets into their hands safely, and I don't 
mean just hand it to them. Make it real, trick them."

"Oh, and one more thing." Hydras's hand slides into his arm and a 
spiked semi-sphere forms around his hand - Hydras Fusion Cannon - 
and points it at the new but old Predacon. (The cannon does not 
always fire at full strength, just in case you're wondering if 
hydras is willing to level his base to get back at wolfy =p)

"Perceptor," He tosses a small explosive device to the other 
bot, "Insert this at the back of Wolfenstein's neck." He turns to 
Wolfy, "If you disobey, you will never disobey again."

Perceptor moves towards Wolfenstein following Hydras commands.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> OOC: SharpClaw is a Predacon, already, at this time. He was out 
with KitKat when she was taken in by the Maximals for medical aid. 
Wolfenstein was a Pred but defected to the nWo. Now that the nWo is 
gone he wishes to return.
>  
> : : SharpClaw/Wolfenstein : :
> 
> SharpClaw and Wolfenstein follow Perceptor in to meat with Hydras.
> 
> The first issue would be Wolfenstein's return to the Predacons. 
SharpClaw would then have to inform Hydras of KitKat's wherabouts.
>
